newsitem.title: UK: NWE naphtha firms very narrowly, but market slow.
newsitem.headline: NWE naphtha firms very narrowly, but market slow.

text.p: NWE naphtha was marginally firmer by 50 cents or so on Friday with physical levels holding close to the $192.50 concluded for a 15-20kt pipeline spec cargo sold late yesterday.
Traders said the physical market was helping to bolster the swaps market where June was ranged around $193 with July showing a 50-cent contango.
Light Virgin Naphtha was pegged around high quotes +$2.75-$3, a steady level against a cargo heard done out of Immingham yesterday.
